Key Match Events: Adolis Garc√≠a homered twice, including a grand slam in the fourth inning.
Carlos Correa and Yordan Alvarez homered for the Astros.
Post-Match Reflections: Jonathan Montgomery, the winning pitcher for the Rangers, improved his postseason record to 3-0.
Astros manager Dusty Baker expressed disappointment in his team's performance, stating, 'We just didn't play well enough to win.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers clinched their first World Series appearance since 2011.
The game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas.
Others: The final score was 11-4 in favor of the Rangers, with 15 hits and 29 total bases for Texas compared to 12 hits and 22 total bases for Houston.
